an6.65:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo anagamiphalam sacchikatum.
an6.65:1.3: Assaddhiyam, ahirikam, anottappam, kosajjam, mutthassaccam, duppannatam—
an6.65:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaya abhabbo anagamiphalam sacchikatum.
an6.65:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo anagamiphalam sacchikatum.
an6.65:2.3: Assaddhiyam, ahirikam, anottappam, kosajjam, mutthassaccam, duppannatam—
an6.65:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaya bhabbo anagamiphalam sacchikatun”ti.
